name: Docker Build Scan Push

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "main" ]

jobs:
  docker:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Login to Docker Hub
        uses: docker/login-action@v3
        with:
          username: sangasangasanga
          password: dckr_pat_q9FBjyj79bF3VI9VWqleUnVE7fo

      - name: Build image
        run: |
          docker build -t sangasangasanga/llm-multiroute:latest .

      - name: Trivy scan
        uses: aquasecurity/trivy-action@0.20.0
        with:
          image-ref: sangasangasanga/llm-multiroute:latest
          severity: HIGH,CRITICAL
          exit-code: 1

      - name: Push image
        run: |
          docker push sangasangasanga/llm-multiroute:latest
